name: Cele, Etherym of the Gate
text:
2 Sea Serpent monsters
You take no battle damage from battles involving this card or the monsters this card points to. This card cannot be targeted for attack if it is pointing to an "Etherym" monster. You can only use the following effects of "Cele, Etherym of the Gate" once per turn. If an "Etherym" monster is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Etherym" Spell/Trap Card that is banished or in the GY to your hand. If an "Etherym" monster is banished: You can return 1 card your opponent controls back to their hand. If a banished "Etherym" monster you own is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Sea Serpent monster from your hand or GY.
